Class Combat

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.combat.Combat
public final class Combat extends Object
Manages the combat logic between the hero and a group of enemies. It handles the turn-based system, status effects, and victory/defeat conditions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a new Combat instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • Combat

      public Combat(Heros heros, List<Ennemi> listEnemies, CombatInteractionDelegate delegate)
      Creates a new Combat instance.
      Parameters:
      heros - The hero player.
      listEnemies - The list of enemies to fight.
      delegate - The delegate to handle UI or specific interactions (e.g., Curses).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any argument is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the list of enemies is empty.

  • Method Details

    • startHeroTurn

      public void startHeroTurn()
      Prepares and starts the hero's turn. It triggers start-of-turn effects, resets energy, and makes enemies plan their next move.

    • tryHeroAction

      public boolean tryHeroAction(ItemInstance instance, Ennemi target)
      Tries to execute a player action using an item from the backpack.
      Parameters:
      instance - The item instance from the backpack to use.
      target - The target enemy (can be null for non-targeted items).
      Returns:
      true if the action was successful, false otherwise.

    • startEnemyTurn

      public void startEnemyTurn()
      Ends the hero's turn and executes the enemies' turn. Enemies perform their planned actions or inflict curses.

    • endCombat

      public void endCombat()
      Handles the end of the combat session. Removes temporary penalties (like SLOW from curses) and grants bonus XP on victory.

    • getState

      public CombatState getState()
      Returns the current state of the combat.
      Returns:
      LOSS if hero is dead, WIN if enemies are empty, IN_PROGRESS otherwise.

    • getHero

      public Heros getHero()
      Gets the hero involved in this combat.
      Returns:
      The hero.

    • getAliveEnemies

      public List<Ennemi> getAliveEnemies()
      Gets a list of currently alive enemies.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list of enemies.

    • isHeroTurn

      public boolean isHeroTurn()
      Checks if it is the hero's turn.
      Returns:
      true if it is the hero's turn.
